Header: Zverev battles past Norrie to advance to his first Acapulco final
Content: Second seeded Alex Zverev advanced to his first Acapulco International final after outdueling unseeded Cameron Norrie in straight sets. Zverev, currently third in the world rankings, jumped out to an early 3-1 lead before 64th ranked Brit Norrie fought back to force a tiebreaker that Zverev dominated. The German then cruised through the second set to claim a 7-6(0) 6-3 victory. Zverev will face the winner of the late semi-final between unseeded Australian Nick Krygios and third seeded American John Isner in this eveningâ€™s final.
